lead_paragraph: Libya's National Oil Corporation (NOC) held an urgent meeting to review crude loading schedules and emergency measures to protect oil facilities after clashes around the major terminals of Es Sider and Ras Lanuf, it said in a statement on Saturday.

headline.main: Libya's NOC Reviewed Loading Schedules After Clashes Near Oil Ports
